reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater vest looks and feels expensive, with quality fabric and a soft, classy texture.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful purchase
items.body: Absolutely love it. The fabric is soft, the fit is perfect, and it looks great! Read more
items.author: Dawn Cheshire

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Purchased multiples!
items.body: Love it! This sleeveless sweater is the same softness and thickness as the other wool blend styles that I purchased from this company. Wash well warm water and flat dry outside. Excellent quality looks expensive. Did I mention that I have purchased other styles? I bought 2 colors black and the oatmeal in this style, 4 in the mock neck sleeveless, 4 mock neck L/S, 4 in the short sleeved. The shortsleeved and great for my spring and fall. I tend to run hot so the Sleeveless for air conditioning and not outside in the full hot summer. I style them as basics stand alone or under blazers both casual and professional. Sizing has been pretty consistent in the styles that I bought which has been medium. This style is slightly oversized so if you’re looking for form fitting you might consider sizing down. My measurements in inches are 41, 34, 40 and size 34/36 DD for reference. Read more
items.author: Audrey

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just Buy It!
items.body: Love this!! It’s a soft knit, but not too thick or heavy and so soft. The shoulders are that boxy sleeveless type that goes to the edge of your shoulder, giving it a more classy look. Can easily wear this to the office with a pair of dress pants or jeans. Because it’s a thinner knit, it could easily be layered under a suit or denim jacket. Read more
items.author: Amazon Buyer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great quality. Runs large.
items.body: Absolutely beautiful but runs really large in size. Read more
items.author: Sheri

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice quality!
items.body: Great fit, very comfortable, it is a beautiful look whether you pair it with a pencil skirt for the office or with jeans, it looks really good. Read more
items.author: Constantino Papadopulos

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality
items.body: This fabric felt really good on my skin. I dressed it up with a pair of halara cream dress pants for work. I received so many compliments. Perfect for the fall. Read more
items.author: Renee Smith

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute top but the stitching came undone
items.body: This sweater is so cute and the weight is perfect, not too heavy not too thin. But after one wash one of the sleeves stitching started to come undone. I really loved this top but wish it would have lasted longer. Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love!!
items.body: Love this sweater. It is super soft and comfortable. Loose fitting in the mid section and can be dressed up or down. Read more
items.author: Brittny

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Crewneck Celadon Green-5046, Mock Neck Apricot, Mock Neck Purple, Mock Neck Blue, Mock Neck Dark Grey, Mock Neck Light Blue, Mock Neck Green, Mock Neck Dusty Red, Mock Neck Lake Blue, Mock Neck Off-white, Mock Neck Rose, Mock Neck Khaki, Mock Neck Green Brown, Mock Neck Coffee. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
